meanings.definition: A type of freshwater salmon found in North America.
meanings.sent1: The kokanees swim gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent2: We caught a bunch of kokanees during our fishing trip.
meanings.sent3: The kokanees decided to throw a party in the stream.
meanings.sent4: The kokanees shimmered like jewels in the water.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the beauty of the kokanees.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'kokanee', referring to multiple fish of this species.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the kokanees swimming together!
meanings.sent2: The fishermen were excited to catch many kokanees.
meanings.sent3: The kokanees held a meeting to discuss their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The school of kokanees moved in perfect unison.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering kokanees created a mesmerizing sight in the river.
